Renderer¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.renderer.Renderer(component_manager)¶

Renders the contents of the Fact behind a Card to a suitable format.

“used_for” = card_type class

render_card_fields(card, fields)¶
Renders a sequence of fields from a card, e.g. by generating html for them. ‘fields’ is typically either fact_view.q_fields or fact_view.a_fields.
render_text(text, field_name, card_type)¶
A lower lever renderer, rendering ‘text’ from a field with name ‘field_name’ from ‘card_type’.
set_property(property_name, property, card_type, fact_key=None)¶
Set a property (like font, colour, ..) for a certain card type. If fact_key is None, then this will be applied to all fact keys.
update(card_type)¶
Update renderer information for given card type.
